message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CC

The paper discusses a novel machine learning algorithm inspired by the fruit fly brain to optimize the sparsity level of a reservoir. This work is related to neural networks and machine learning, specifically in the area of reservoir computing. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). The paper also discusses the optimization of sparsity through gradient descent and Markov chain Monte Carlo methods, which are common techniques in machine learning and optimization, suggesting that the paper could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also discusses the role of inhibitory feedback neurons and the classification of different odours, which are related to systems and control (cs.SY) and computational complexity (cs.CC), respectively.
